short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that enables powerful exporting of your OpenAI Chats. Saves the chat. Work funded by micropayment model.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat Nostalgia saves your currently open AI chat threads. It simply presents a button, applies powerful processing, and then hits a service that allows you to pay less than a dollar to download the chat securely via Stripe. 

Since OpenAI chat came out less than a week ago, this extension will be in rapid iteration and should be expected to have some quirks (that is why it is priced low enough to forget about).
